generateNgrams(String, int, int) - Static method in class langModel.NgramUtil
Method parsing the given sentence and generate all the combinations of ngrams, by varying the order n between the given minOrder and maxOrder.
getCounts(String) - Method in class langModel.MyNgramCounts
 
getCounts(String) - Method in interface langModel.NgramCounts
Getter of the data structure which maps the n-grams to the counts and return the count of a particular n-gram.
getHistory(String, int) - Static method in class langModel.NgramUtil
Method parsing a n-gram and returning its history, i.e. the n-1 preceding words.

getMaximalOrder() - Method in interface langModel.NgramCounts

getNgramCounterSize() - Method in interface langModel.NgramCounts
Getter of the data structure which maps the n-grams to the counts and return the number of mapped n-grams.

getNgrams() - Method in class langModel.MyNgramCounts
 
getNgrams() - Method in interface langModel.NgramCounts

getSequenceSize(String) - Static method in class langModel.NgramUtil
Method counting the number of words in a given sequence (the sequence can be a n-gram or a sentence).
